title: Ring mail
data:
{{version030}} {{armour |name = Ring mail |cost = 72 |weight = 25.0 |AC = 5 |EV = 7 |maxenc = +5 |skill = Armour |size = Small, Medium |GDR = 24% }} {{flavour|A light leather suit reinforced with a covering of metal rings. It is protective in combat, but slightly uncomfortable due to the added weight.}} '''Ring mail''' is a body [[armour]] one step heavier than [[leather armour]]. ==Desirability== Ring mail can be a decent armour for hybrid and/or [[EV]]-based characters. It strikes a balance between not interfering with EV/spells too much, and providing some protection. Casters with low strength may prefer a lighter armour to decrease spell failure, while a strong melee brute will definitely prefer a heavier one. Unless you find a particularly good ring mail, you'll want to upgrade to [[swamp dragon scales]], which offers more AC for the same encumbrance. Or [[steam dragon scales]], which offers the same AC but with 0 encumbrance. ==Trivia== [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ring_mail Ring mail] is an item of armour whose historical existence is somewhat doubtful. It seems more likely that it is a Victorian misinterpretation of contemporary depictions of chain mail or scale mail, or that the rings were merely items of decoration. {| class="prettytable" style="border:none; margin:auto; padding:0; text-align: center" ! || Image |- | '''Mundane''' || [[Image:Ring mail1.png]] |- | '''Magical''' || [[Image:Ring mail2.png]] |- | '''Artefact''' || [[Image:Ring mail3.png]] |} {{armours}}
